title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Singing) School days school days, teacher's golden-

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle's little brother, IKE, bounces into frame.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: -Ah damn it, my little brother's trying to follow me to school again.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: BaBa Simi

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ike, you can't come to school with me!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: BaBa Simi ba baa.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah, go home you little dildo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude! Don't call my brother a dildo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What's a dildo?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I don't know... and I'll bet Cartman doesn't know either!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I know what it means!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, what?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: ...I'm not telling you.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What's a dildo, Kenny?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kenny talks, but we can't understand him through his thick
text: coat.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Mph rmph phrmph m phrmph mmr.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: HA YEAH! THAT'S WHAT KYLE'S LITTLE BROTHER IS ALRIGHT!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Suddenly, Kyle grabs Ike by the feet, swings him around, and
text: bashes Cartman in the face.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OW!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude that kicks ass!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah! Check this one out! (to Ike) Ready Ike? Kick the baby

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Don't kick the baby.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Kick the baby.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle kicks his brother down the icy road.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Wahhhhh!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Ike shoots down the road with a playful scream, and crashes
text: head first into a group of mail boxes.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Whoa, Cartman, looks like you didn't get much sleep last night.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That's 'cause I was having these bogus nightmares.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Really, what about?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, I dreamt that I was lying in my bed... In the dark...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman is lying in his bed.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: ...When all of a sudden this bright blue light filled the room.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: A bright light fills the room.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: And slowly my bedroom door began to open... And then the next thing I remember, I was being drug through a hallway!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman is being dragged by his ankles down a dark, organic
text: corridor like the one seen in 'Fire In The Sky'.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Then I was lying on a table, and these scary aliens wanted to operate on me!  And they had big heads... And big black eyes-

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The boys are listening to Cartman's story with wide eyes and
text: open mouths. Even little Ike is enthralled.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude! Visitors!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Totally!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That wasn't a dream, Cartman, those were visitors!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Nervous) No, it was just a dream. My mom said so!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Visitors are real!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah, they abduct people and they mutilate cows!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ah shut up, you guys, you're just trying to make me scared, and it's not working.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: A large Chevy screeches to a halt. CHEF gets out of the car
text: and approaches the kids.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hello there, children.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, Chef.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What's gonna be for lunch today, Chef?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, today it's Salisbury steak with buttered noodles and a choice of green bean casserole or vegetable medley.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Kick ass!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Say, did any of you children see the alien spaceship last night?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: HUH?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah, fat boy saw it!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No! Th-That was just a dream! And I'm NOT fat, I'm big-boned.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (To Cartman) Oh, was it the ones with the big long heads and the black eyes?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (PETRIFIED) AH!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: They took him on their ship!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ooh... Did they give you an anal probe?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: AGH!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What's an anal probe?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That's when they put this big metal hoop-a-joo up your butt.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Woa! They gave you an anal probe, Cartman?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Defensive) No! I mean... Uh... Why would they do that?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude, they DID huh? Aliens stuck stuff up your ass!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: NO!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ana Pobe!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: SHUT UP, DILDO!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, I gotta get to the cafeteria. You children watch that fat boy now, he could be under alien control.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Chef turns to get back in his car and Cartman notices that
text: the back of Chef's shirt has an EXACT image of the alien he saw, and the word 'Believe'.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: We told you they were real Cartman. Sorry to hear about your ass.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Extremely angry) God Dammit, they didn't do anything to my ass! It was just a dream!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The school bus pulls up and the boys start getting on.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Why are you walking so funny, Cartman?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Shut up!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Little Ike tries to follow his brother onto the bus.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I'll bla bblaa blaa

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No, Ike! Go home!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle gets ready to kick his brother.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Bla Wa Wah

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: This is it!! This one's for the game.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Bllaa aaahh haah

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Kick the baby.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle kicks his brother through the school bus window, and
text: Ike flies into a snowbank.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The boys quickly get on the bus. Ike pulls his head out of
text: the snow and looks around for his brother.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The kids walk past their mean old bus driver, MS. CRABTREE.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Good morning, Ms. Crabtree.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Sit down! We're running late!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan and Kyle walk to the back of the bus and take their
text: seats. Cartman and Kenny sit up a few rows. Kyle looks out the back window to see Ike still standing at the bus stop.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dammit, he's still there!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, don't worry about him.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No, dude, if something happens to him my parents are gonna blame me!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: SIT DOWN BACK THERE!! AAHHHH!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah, whatever you fat bitch.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: WHAT DID YOU SAY?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I said I have a bad itch.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan and Kyle sit down and the school bus moves on. Kyle
text: turns around one last time to look at his brother.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OH MY GOD!!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: A group of VISITORS, with large heads and almond shaped eyes,
text: surround Ike.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: VISITORS!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Scared, Kenny pulls his hood shut.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Mph mprmhpm bmarmphs!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ike!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The visitors lead Ike to a large space craft hidden in the
text: trees.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: STOP THE BUS!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle runs to the front of the bus.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ms. Crabtree, you have to stop this bus!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Do you want an office referral?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (SCARED) No.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Then sit down!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: But I....

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: AAHH!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: AAHHH!!!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: AAHHHH!!!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle runs to the back of the bus and hopelessly looks out
text: the back window again just in time to see the spaceship take off.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Cartman, are those the same Visitors you saw?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman isn't looking. He still thinks this is all a big
text: joke.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Shut up, you guys, it's not working.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: We have to do something!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, we can't do anything for now. That fat bitch won't let us.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: WHAT DID YOU SAY?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I-I said that rabbits eat lettuce.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh... (Pause) Well, yes, they certainly do.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Ms. Crabtree turns the schoolbus violently and the children
text: go flying everywhere screaming.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What am I going to do? My little brothers been abducted by aliens.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You farted!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Somebody's baking brownies.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: We see the alien space ship leave the planet.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That's the third cow this month, at this rate all my cattle are gonna die before the Winter's through.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The cows look up with concern.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: This is nothing out of the unusual. Cows turn themselves inside out all the time.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: People been sayin' they've been seeing UFO's around.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: UFO's?? Ha Ha.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yea, and black army CIA helicopters and trucks.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That is the silliest thing I've ever heard.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then black army helicopters fly by.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What was that?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That, that was a pigeon.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What am I supposed to do Barbrady? Just stand here and watch my cattle get mutilated one by one?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: We see the aliens with grass in their hands whistling to the
text: cows.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, my cattle!! You see there is something funny going on.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: There's nothing funny going on. I'll get those cows back.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: INT. CLASSROOM - SOUTH PARK ELEMENTARY SCHOOL - DAY

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: And now children, our friend Mr. Hat is going to tell us about Christopher Columbus.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Mr. Garrison has a ridiculous little puppet on his right
text: hand that wears a striped hat.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That's right Mr. Garrison. Christopher Columbus discovered America, and was the Indians best friend. He helped the Indians win their war against Frederick Douglas, and, and freed the Hebrews from Napoleon, and discovered France.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (TO STAN) Oh man, I can't just sit here! I have to help my stupid brother or I'll come home without him and my dad will start yelling - "Where's your brother, Kyle!" "You weren't looking out for your little brother Kyle!"

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Okay, okay, let's ditch school and go find him-

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: "You know he can't think on his own, Kyle. Brush and Floss, Kyle!" "Where has that finger been, Kyle?!"

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: DUDE!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Is there a problem, boys?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yes, Mr. Garrison, I have to go now.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh really, Kyle? What is it this time?  Another prostate tumor?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No, my little brother has been abducted by aliens.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Mr. Garrison stares blankly at Kyle.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: It's true! Ask Cartman, they gave him an anal probe!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman looks around at the other children, extremely
text: embarrassed, and finally forces a little laugh as if to say it's all a little joke.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Uhh.. Huh, huh... That's a little joke.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle steps to the front of class.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Mr. Garrison, seriously, I HAVE to go!  Can I PLEASE be excused from class?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I don't know, Kyle. Did you ask Mr. Hat?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle looks down at the stupid puppet on Garrison's hand.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I don't want to ask Mr. Hat, I'm asking YOU!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, I think you should ask Mr. Hat.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (SIGHING) Mr. Hat, may I please be excused from class?...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Mr. Garrison shoves his puppeted hand violently in Kyle's
text: face, and changes his voice.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well Kyle, NO! You hear me? You go to hell, you go to hell and you die!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hmm, guess you'll have to take your seat, Kyle.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dammit!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ha, ha! Mr. Hat yelled at you!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then, Cartman farts a HUGE fireball.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: AAAGHH!! Ow, my ass!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Damn Cartman!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OW! OWWW MY ASS!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude, he's farting fire!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (pointing to Cartman) It's the alien anal probe! It's shooting fire from Cartman's rectum!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No, that was just a dream!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Eric, do you need to sit in the corner until your flaming gas is under control?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No, Mr. Garrison. I'm fine.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman farts a HUG fireball which burns PIP, a little english
text: boy.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OWWWW!!!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The class watches as their classmate runs out in flames.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: A train is passing by and the cows are standing in line trying
text: to get on.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, you cows can't get on this train, this is a people train. You cows have no business on a people train, alright, 'cause you're cows.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The cows stare at the engineer.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No, no no, don't try any of that cow hypnosis on me alright, 'cause it's not going to work!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then, Officer Barbrady drives up with his sirens on.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hold it right there cows.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cows start to stampede away from Barbrady.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Come back here!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The kids are all in line for lunch. Cartman farts a huge
text: fireball.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OOOOWWWW!!! Ooh, I sure am hungry.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: How can you eat when you're farting fire?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Shut up, dude. You're being totally immature.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey look! There's Wendy Testaburger!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Where?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Adorable little WENDY TESTABURGER steps into the lunch line.
text: ZOOM in on Stan who is absolutely in love. Little Hearts form all around his head - and Tchaikovsky's 'Romeo and Juliet' swells up.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The other boys see Stan's reaction and laugh.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Singing) Stan wan-ts to ki-ss Wen-dy Testaburger

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Shut up Fat Ass! I don't even like her!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I'm not fat - And you obviously like her, because you throw up every time she talks to you!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I do not!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Wendy walks up to the boys.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hi guys.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hi Wendy.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Here Stan, this is for you.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Wendy hands Stan a note.  Stan VOMITS VIOLENTLY all over
text: himself.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ew!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Bye Wendy.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude, what does the note say?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan opens the note and reads it.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Holy crap!  It says she wants to meet ME at Starks Pond after school.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Whoa, maybe you can kiss her.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Or slip her the tongue.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Mmmph mrrr mff Mrmmph

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What? How do you know she has a cat?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: After a painfully long pause, the boys all laugh.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I get it.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: C'mon you guys, we need to figure out how to get out of school so we can get my little brother back!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The boys make it to the front of the line, where Chef is
text: handing lunch trays to the boys and girls.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hello there children.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, Chef.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: How are you doing?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Bad.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Why bad?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Chef, have you ever had something happen to you... But nobody believed you?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Aw, children, children, that's a problem we've ALL had to face at some time or another. Here, let me sing you a little song... It might clear things up.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (SINGING) I'm gonna make love to you woman, gonna lay you down by the fire - And caress your womanly body, make you moan and perspire,

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ah Chef, Chef.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Gonna get those juices flowin'

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Chef.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: We're making love gravy, love gravy,

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Chef!!!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Love, love, love.... GRAVY!!!-

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: -CHEF!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Huh, do you feel better?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, come on children, what can be so bad? It's Salisbury steak day!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Visitors took Kyle's baby brother.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: WHAT?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Chef runs around the counter and kneels down by the kids.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Whispering) Well what the hell are you doing in school, eating Salisbury steak?! Go find him, dammit!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Mr. Garrison won't let us out of school. He thinks we're making it up.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You ARE making it up!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then, Cartman farts another fireball. But this time, a
text: long, metal object emerges from his ass. It opens like a robotic eye and looks around.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Woa!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The eye looks around, blinks, then closes itself and zips
text: back into Cartman's ass.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That was cool!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Chef spins Cartman around and looks at his ass.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: It's some kind of sembiodic metamorphosis device. This could mean the visitors want to communicate with us!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, I see, now YOU'RE going to join in on the little joke, huh?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: It's no joke children, this is big!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (pleading) Please Chef, if I don't get out of school and get my little brother back from the aliens, my parents are gonna disown me.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ah, hold on now... You got to help the children!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You guys sure are going a long way to try to scare me. I WANT MY SALISBURY STEAK!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Fire Drill!!! Fire Drill, everybody out. Okay children, this is your chance.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Killer, thanks Chef.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Man oh man, first contact with the alien visitors. I've got to get myself ready...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: We got out of school... No more school today... We got out of school.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OHHHH - YOU GUYS, MY ASS!! SERIOUSLY.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Okay, Cartman, you can stop farting fire now.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I would if I could you son of a bitch!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Okay, so how do we get my little brother back?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Would you stop going on about your little brother?! I KNOW it was just a dream! I KNOW I didn't have an anal probe! And I KNOW that I'm not under alien control!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Suddenly, there is a loud BZAP!!! Cartman's expression
text: completely changes.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: His eyes widen - and his mouth curls into a false smile.
text: Strange 30's music starts to play from nowhere and Cartman starts to sing (although his voice isn't his own)

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Singing) I love to sing-a! About the moon-a and the Juna and the spring-a! I love to sing-a!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan and Kyle look on, perplexed.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: About a sky of blue or a tea for two.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just as suddenly as it started, the music stops and Cartman
text: goes back to his normal self. The boys all stare at each other. Cartman looks absolutely baffled.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What the hell was that?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: He is under alien control. That thing in his butt is linked up to the visitors.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, son of a bitch.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You guys shut up, I'm not under alien control.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle walks up to Cartman's ear and starts screaming in it.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: HEY!! IF YOU VISITORS CAN HEAR ME -- BRING ME BACK MY LITTLE BROTHER GOD DAMMIT!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ow! That hurts, you butt licker!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Suddenly, a small alien scout ship flies by.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: KYLE, LOOK! It's them!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle picks a rock up off the ground.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: GIVE ME BACK MY BROTHER!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle throws the rock at the UFO. DING! The UFO stops and
text: fires a yellow ray at the boys.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The ray hits Kenny, and blows him back several yards.  Kenny
text: lands with a horrible bone breaking CRUNCH!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh my God!! They killed Kenny!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: YOU BASTARDS!! COME BACK HERE!! COME BAAAAACK!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: But the little UFO's disappear into the sky.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: DAMMIT! We were so close!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, look - I think Kenny's okay!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kenny manages to pick himself up off the ground. He looks
text: pretty bad, but he might be-

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then the cows come stampeding through and run over Kenny.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Mff mrrr mph VWOOM!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Officer Barbrady's car races through frame and runs over
text: Kenny.  The boys walk over to Kenny's bleeding body.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Wow, poor Kenny.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Now do you believe us Cartman?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Cartman, they KILLED Kenny!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: He's not dead.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude, Kenny is dead! See?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Shut up, you guys.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Pulling Kenny's head off) He's DEAD, Cartman.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: GOD DAMMIT I DIDN'T HAVE AN ANAL PROBE!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Screw you guys, I'm going home!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Go on and go home you Fat Chicken!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dildo!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You're all I have left, Stan.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Sorry dude, I gotta go meet Wendy Testaburger.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You can't! Poor Ike must be so scared... Up there all alone... You gotta help me dude!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude, like Chef says, I gotta get a piece of loving while the gettin's hot.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Rats come into frame and feast on Kenny's dead body.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Rats!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman walks into his house and is greeted by his overly
text: pleasant MOTHER.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hello Eric.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hi Mom.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: How are you doing?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, I'm pissed off.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Here, I made you powder doughnut pancake surprise.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I don't want powder doughnut pancake surprise! All the kids at school call me fat!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You're not fat, you're big boned.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That's what I said.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You can have an eency weency bit can't you?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: NO!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Just a weency eency woo woo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: NO leave me alone mom!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: How about a nice chocolate chicken potpie, then?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What? Well that does sound pretty good.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman sits down at the couch and turns on the T.V.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Uh, Mom?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yes, hon?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: If anybody calls or comes over - I'm not here, okay?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Sure, hon. You want some Cheesy Poofs too?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yea I want Cheesy Poofs!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan and Kyle are standing at Stark's pond.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, looks like she's not gonna show up, Stan. Let's go look for the visitors now.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: But her note said she'd be here!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hi Stan.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Wendy appears from frame left. Stan immediately vomits all
text: over himself.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ew!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You can't talk to Stan, Wendy, he throws up when you do.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: But why Stan?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Eww!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Look, could you guys just get down to business so we can go find my little brother?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Huh?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Just make sweet love down by the fire.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What happened to your little brother?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman is still busy eating and watching T.V.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: A TV REPORTER stands out in a random wheat field.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: As the reports of UFO sightings increase, more mysterious crop-circle patterns are appearing in fields all around South Park. These crop circles, when viewed from above, form strange patterns...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: ZOOM OUT to show a huge crop-circle that looks EXACTLY like
text: Cartman.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, that kinda looks like... Tom Selleck.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Could it be that aliens are trying to make contact with us here on Earth?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then, Cartman's cute little kitty, KITTY, walks up and
text: looks at him innocently. The kitty MEOWs.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No Kitty... This is MY pot-pie.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No kitty! Bad Kitty!!  No Kitty, this is MY pot pie!!! MOMM!!! Kitty's being a dildo!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman's mother appears from the kitchen.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well then I know a certain kitty kitty who's sleeping with mommy tonight.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle is finishing his story to Wendy.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: ...And now I have to go home without him and my parents are going to have me killed!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, why don't you go get the fat kid?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Why?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well if the fat kid has something implanted in his ass, maybe the visitors are using him as part of their plan. You should use the fat kid as bait to bring them back.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, you're right Wendy! C'mon Stan, We have to go get Cartman!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: C'mon Stan!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ewwww!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey wait, when do I get to make sweet love?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: No Kitty!! You can't have any!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The cat puts its paw up and meows cutely.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: NO KITTY! THIS IS MY POT-PIE! BAD KITTY!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman farts a fireball onto his cat. The cat runs away, on
text: fire, making horrible sounds.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, excuse me, kitty.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman's mother opens the door to reveal Stan, Kyle and
text: Wendy.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Eric, look who's here!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Dude, WEAK mom!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Come on, Eric, we're going to go play at the bus stop.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Can't- My mom says-

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That's okay, Eric. I think you need to spend time with your little friends.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: But mom, I don't want to spend time with my little friends.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Don't be difficult, Eric. Now you go out and play in the fun snow.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: God Dammit!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The burning kitty races through frame.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: EXT. REMOTE LOCATION BY A TREE - NIGHT

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan ties a rope to Cartman's ankle. Kyle ties the other end
text: to a nearby tree.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (EXTREMELY NERVOUS) You guys, I have to get home.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Don't be such a fraidy cat, Cartman! This rope will make sure they can't take you on board again.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Wendy, Stan and Kyle walk over to some bushes and crouch
text: down, leaving Cartman all alone in the darkness.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman stares up nervously at the starry, ominous sky.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh man, this sucks.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: How come the visitors aren't coming for him?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I think we need to signal the them somehow.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman farts and a flame lights up the surroundings.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OWWWWW!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, he's like rudolph!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah all you have to do is fart some more, Cartman, and the visitors are sure to come.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Really? Uhh.. I don't think I have to fart anymore tonight.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Sure you do!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Come on, Cartman! Fart!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I don't wanna...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: He can't hold it in forever.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Fart Damn you!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Okay!! That does it!!! Now listen! Why is it that everything today has involved things either going in or coming out of MY ASS?! I'm sick of it!  It's completely immature!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Suddenly, the metal rod emerges once again from Cartman's
text: ass.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey! It's happening again!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: This time, the rod looks around, then expands, and expands,
text: folds over onto itself and expands again, until finally an eighty foot satellite dish is sticking out of Cartman's ass.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Woa! Look at that!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Now do you believe us Cartman?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman glances quickly at the dish.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You guys can't scare me! I know you're making it all up!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Cartman!  There's an eighty-foot satellite dish sticking out of your ass!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Sure you guys, whatever.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The dish powers up with a low hum and a huge yellow beam of
text: light shoots out from it like a searchlight.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The beam of light emulates from Earth and shoots outwards
text: into space.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Chef is dressed in party clothes and sunglasses. He is sitting
text: in a lounge chair out on his front lawn. He has a little sign that reads 'Welcome Visitors!' Chef notices the big bright light.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, boy! The aliens are going to make first contact!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Shouting) Hey, down here! We are ready for your wisdom! (Checking his watch) And you only got twenty minutes before Sanford and Son is on!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: YOU GUYS! I AM SERIOUSLY GETTING PISSED OFF RIGHT NOW! I KNOW THERE'S NO SUCH THING AS ALIENS!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then, a HUGE alien mother ship drops down from the sky
text: directly above Cartman. It is quickly followed by several scout ships.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: OH, GOD DAMMIT!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Mr. Garrison is driving by and stops when he sees all the
text: commotion.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What the? I tell you, there is some crazy stuff going on in this town.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You can say that again, Mr. Garrison.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Come down here you stinkin' aliens!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Five aliens beam down, and instantly appear in front of Stan,
text: Kyle, and Wendy. The kids are really scared.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Go on, Kyle, ask them for your little brother back...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Tenderly) V-Visitors...  This morning you took my brother, Ike.  He's the little freckled kid that looks like a football...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: At first I was happy you took him away... But I've learned something today; that having a little brother is a pretty special thing.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Aw, heck, Mr. Visitors, I'm just a kid all alone in this crazy world, but if you could just find it in your hearts or whatever you have to give my brother back to me, it sure would make my life brighter again

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle bows his head down and starts to sob.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That was beautiful, dude.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (still looking down) Did it work?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Nope, they're leaving.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: HEY YOU SKRAWNY ASS (BEEP)-HEADS!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: WHAT'S THE (BEEP) IS WRONG WITH YOU, YOU (BEEP) LITTLE (BEEP). YOU MUST BE SOME KIND OF (BEEP) TO BE ABLE TO IGNORE A CRYING CHILD.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Woa, dude.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: YOU KNOW WHAT YOU LIKE!? I BET YOU'D ALL LIKE TO (BEEP) YOUR OWN (BEEP) WHILE SHE (BEEP) ON YOUR (BEEP) (BEEP)!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey Wendy, what's a (BEEEEEP)

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Suddenly, a large door on the alien mothership opens. Ike is
text: entombed in some sort of alien machinery. He is being spun around and is shocked with all sorts of alien electricy but generally looks as happy as he always does.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Blaa Ba Wah Wahh

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ike! Jump down now for the love of God Ike, JUMP!!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Bo ham me!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Just then, the herd of cows comes running in.  The cows come
text: to a screeching halt RIGHT IN FRONT of the aliens!  Their poor little cow eyes grow wide and they start to shake.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The visitors stare at the cows. The cows shiver, they have
text: nowhere to run. Finally, one of the visitors raises its hand in a Vulcan-like gesture.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Mooo. Moooo. Mooo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: SUBTITLES: "Greetings, Cows of Earth. We come in peace."

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The cows all look at each other. Finally, one cow makes a
text: noise.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Meanwhile, Kyle and the kids are still trying to get Ike to
text: jump down.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Come on, Ike! I promise I'll be nice to you from now on!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Don kick da bebe!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The visitors continue to moo at the cows.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo. Moo. Moo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: SUBTITLES: "We have experimented with all the beings of Earth,
text: and have learned that you are the most intelligent and wise."

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: What the hell are they talking about?!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo. Moo, moo?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Subtitle: "Why did you turn some of us inside out?"

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The visitors look at each other.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo, moo, moo. Moo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Subtitle: "Oh, that was Carl's fault. He's new."

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Another visitor steps raises his hand in the background

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo. Moo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Subtitle: "Yeah, sorry about that. My bad."

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The visitors hand over a small clear obelisk and place it on
text: the ground in front of the cows who just stare at it.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo, moo, moo. Moo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Subtitle: "Take this device. It is a gift from us."

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle stands underneath his brother who still won't jump down.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ike! Do your impersonation of David Caruso's career.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: It's my tun!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Finally, Ike jumps from the machine and lands upside down in
text: the snow.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The large satellite dish collapses and disappears back into
text: Cartman's ass.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Moo, moo, moo. Moo.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Subtitle: "Farewell, cows, peace be with you."

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The visitors disappear and beam up to their ship. A light
text: shines down on Cartman down and sucks him up.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: You guys! Get me down from here!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Flames shoot out of Cartman's ass in a flaming fart. The
text: flames burn the rope and Cartman goes shooting upwards.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman floats up into the spacecraft. Once inside, the hatch
text: closes and the ship takes off. In the distance, the kids can hear Cartman.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Heeeeeeelp... Sonns a bitcheeees!! DIIIIILLLLLDOOOS!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: With the UFO gone, the forest is silent once again.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I'm sure glad that's over with.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah, boy am I glad to see you, Ike!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh he fly at the sky.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Wait, where are you going Alien visitors? Come back!!!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well Chef, where's this amazing thing you're going to show us?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, it's in the bedroom ladies, come on in.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: C'mon Ike, we can make it just in time for dinner.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Kyle and Ike walk away, leaving Stan and Wendy alone.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Thanks for your help, Wendy.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Whatever, dude.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey I didn't throw up!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Cool!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan and Wendy move closer as if about to kiss...  closer...
text: closer... And finally - Stan vomits all over himself and Wendy.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ew!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Sorry.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey look! A french fry!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Cool!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: And what is that?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I think its part of a Cheesy Poof.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Hey, what's that?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Wendy and Stan continue to identify food stuffs in Stan's
text: vomit, silhouetted against a full moon.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Stan and Kyle wait for the bus.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Gee, the bus'll be here any minute and Cartman still isn't around.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Yeah, we're running out of friends.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: I wonder what that thing was the visitors gave the cows?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The cows graze peacefully. They have their little object
text: with them.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ha ha cows, I got you cornered. Let's see you get away now!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: One of the cows steps on the object that the aliens gave
text: them and a ray shoots out and hits Officer Barbrady who begins to dance and sing (although his voice isn't his own) the way Cartman did when he was under the alien control.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: (Singing) I love to sing-a! About the moon-a and the Juna and the spring-a! I love to sing-a!  About a sky of blue or a tea for two.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: The cows jump up and down gleefully.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Suddenly, Cartman drops from the sky and lands with a dull
text: thud into the snow.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh, hey Cartman!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Cartman moans. The school bus pulls up.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Wow, Cartman, the visitors dropped you off just in time to go to school!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh man, I had this crazy nightmare last night...

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Really? What about?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Well, I was standing out in a field and I had this HUGE satellite dish stickin' outta my butt. And then there was hundreds of cows and aliens, and then I went up on the ship and Scott Baio gave me pink eye.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: That wasn't a dream Cartman. That really happened!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Oh right, why don't have pink eye then?

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Cartman, you DO have pink eye!

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
role: Sure enough, Cartman's eyes are a bright shade of pink.

title: CARTMAN GETS AN ANAL PROBE
text: Ah son of a bitch.
